Question
========

Of all voters in the US, 45% favor candidate X for president. Pollsters take a sample of 3,500 voters. What is the expected proportion of people in the sample who support candidate X?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,45
* 0,55
* 1
* 1575

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.45: Correct
* 0.55: Incorrect
* 1: Incorrect
* 1575: Incorrect
